clinical_study.brief_title: Conversion Rate of (TST) Tuberculin Skin Test and Quantiferon-TB Gold In Tube Assay in Health Care Workers
clinical_study.official_title: Conversion Rate of TST and Quantiferon-TB Gold In Tube Assay in Health Care Workers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to access conversion rate of TST (Tuberculin skin test) and Quantiferon-TB Gold In tube assay in health care workers.

primary_outcome.measure: conversion rate of latent tuberculosis infection in hospital workers

arm_group.description: health care workers who performed TST or Quantiferon-TB Gold In tube assay before

biospec_descr.textblock: whole blood for perfoming Quantiferon-TB Gold in tube assay

study_pop.textblock: health care workers who performed TST or Quantiferon-TB Gold In tube assay before

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 20-75, men and women
- participant who was enrolled in the study of latent tuberculosis in health care worker (IRB No.4-2009-0187)
- high risk or low risk health care worker who was performed TST or Quantiferon-TB Gold In tube assay before
Exclusion Criteria:
- age < 20
- person who don't agree with enrollment
- illiterate
- person who is diagnosed as active tuberculosis now
- person who has history of hypersensitivity on PPD (tuberculin purified protein derivative)
- pregnant woman
- person who is treated as active tuberculosis
